mapper.insert: insert into members(member_num, member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_phone1, member_birth, member_email, member_regist) values(#{memberNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone1}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberEmail}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select member_num from members where member_id = #{memberId}
